description:
News flash: We are not returning to the economy of 2006. And according to internationally certified coach, award-wining speaker and author, Meridith Elliott Powell, that's good news for those of us ready to put passion back into what we do and increase our bottom line substantially.

In this series of lectures and hands-on challenges, Meridith shows you exactly how to use the realities of today's economy—the Trust & Value Economy— to take your career and your business to new heights.

In three steps, she helps you (1) understand the changes, (2) use those changes to your advantage and (3) ensure you and your business are positioned to win whatever tomorrow's economy brings.

Hey, it's no longer about building the best product—that's a given in today's world. It's about building trust and value. And if you are willing to put in the work, Meridith can show you how to make this year your best ever.

Make today's economy—the Trust & Value Economy—YOUR economy with 3 Steps To Winning In The Trust & Value Economy
title: 3 Steps to Winning in the Trust and Value Economy
